subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text: {{ja-kanji|grade=3|rs=欠02}}

subSections.title: Readings
subSections.text:
{{ja-readings
|goon=し
|kanon=し
|kanyoon=じ
|kun=す-く, す-き, つ-いで, つ-ぐ, つぎ-
|nanori=き, すき, よし
}}

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|目%次|もく%じ}}

subSections.title: Etymology 1
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=on|し}}

subSections.title: Affix
Usage notes
subSections.text: Only found in compounds.

subSections.title: Derived terms
Etymology 2
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=kanyo|じ}}

subSections.title: Counter
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|じ}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=じ|rare}} [[order]], [[sequence]]

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: Seldom found in isolation.

subSections.title: Prefix
Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|つぎ}}
Nominalization of the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=つぎ}}-derived verb {{m|ja|次ぐ|tr=tsugu||to be in a sequence; to follow, to continue from something, to be next; to connect, to join}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|つぎ|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
Etymology 4
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|すき}}

subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: * {{ja-l|主基}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|すき}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=すき|Shinto}} at the {{m|ja|大嘗祭|tr=Daijōsai}} and other major Shintō ceremonies, refers to the group of regional representatives making [[offering]]s of [[sake]] and [[grain]], who do so after the initial offering

subSections.title: Etymology 5
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|ついで|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: * {{ja-l|序}}, {{ja-l|序で}}, {{ja-l|第}}, {{ja-l|次いで}}, {{ja-l|尋いで}}, {{ja-l|次第}}, {{ja-l|嗣}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|ついで}}

# [[order]], [[sequence]]
# [[follower]], [[successor]]; the [[next]] thing in a sequence
# a [[good]] [[opportunity]] to do something; doing something [[incidental]] to something else

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: The ''good opportunity'' sense is more often encountered as {{ja-r|序でに|ついで に}}.

subSections.text:
